column2: NetApp, Inc. provides software, systems, and services to manage and share data on-premises, and private and public clouds worldwide. The company is headquartered in Sunnyvale, California and currently employs 10,500 full-time employees. The firm enables enterprises, service providers, governmental organizations, and partners to envision, deploy and evolve their information technology (IT) environments. The firm offers a portfolio of products and services that satisfy a range of customer workloads across different data types and deployment models. Its data management and storage offerings help manage business productivity, performance and profitability, while providing investment protection and asset utilization. The firm's FlexPod portfolio includes FlexPod Datacenter for core enterprise data centers and service providers, FlexPod Express for medium-sized businesses and branch offices, and FlexPod Select for data-intensive workloads. The portfolio is validated with hypervisors, operating systems, systems management tools and cloud management platforms.
